name: ScryeRL:Wrath of the Seid
description:
"Hero,just when I thought it's over,we encountered a new threat.His name is Seid and he is the leader of the town called Anghor Thom.I will give You new power,Devil Fury,and You will be different."

In this expansion You will get:

-Anghor Thom(Level 20-25)

-Neverending content 

-Deviol Skin

-Nerfed Health and Mana recovery

-New items in the shop: Super Health Potion,and Super Mana Potion.

[!] Sorcerer now drop:

-The Reaper (Attack +15)

-Blood Knight Defender (Defence +14)

-Sorcerer's Helmet (Defence +20)

-Sorcerer's Chest (Defence +20)

-Sorcerer's Amulet (Health+20,Mana+20)

[!]Because You will be again Level 1,I will gift You 5 Super Health Potions,and 5 Super Mana Potions.

If I make new expansion for this game,You will be able to continue with Your character.

DOWNLOAD original ScryeRL here: https://neidnex.itch.io/scryerl
